alert.note: Alert for Chatham; Cumberland; Harnett; Hoke; Lee; Moore; Wake (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 14 at 3:17PM EDT until July 14 at 3:45PM EDT by NWS Raleigh
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 345 PM EDT FOR EAST CENTRAL MOORE...HARNETT...NORTHWESTERN CUMBERLAND...LEE... SOUTHWESTERN WAKE...NORTHEASTERN HOKE AND SOUTHEASTERN CHATHAM COUNTIES... At 317 PM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 11 miles west of Fuquay-Varina to near Fort Liberty, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Fayetteville, Cary, Sanford, Lillington, Fort Liberty, Fuquay-Varina, Angier, Pope AFB, Apex and Holly Springs. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. To report severe weather contact your nearest law enforcement agency. They will send your report to the National Weather Service office in Raleigh.

area.areaDesc: Chatham; Cumberland; Harnett; Hoke; Lee; Moore; Wake
